snippet: The companies said they had withdrawn their application to the F.C.C. to join their cellular phone operations but still plan to contest a federal antitrust lawsuit and pursue their $39 billion deal.

headline.main: AT&T Merger With T-Mobile Faces Setbacks

snippet: The decision by the government opens the door for Wal-Mart, Tesco, Ikea and other firms to establish a presence in one of the world’s biggest markets.
abstract: Indian government will allow foreign retailers to open stores in country for first time, opening vast and long-protected market; rule allows retailers that sell multiple brands, like Wal-Mart and Tesco, to control up to 51 percent stake of their Indian operations in partnership with an Indian investor; continues to bar single-brand stores like Apple and Nike.

headline.main: India to Ease Retail Rules for Foreign Companies
headline.print_headline: India to Ease Retail Rules For Foreign Companies

snippet: This week's recipe apple bourbon bundt cake directs you to use a stand mixer, but a hand mixer will work just fine.

snippet: I'm personally not a big fan of Crisco, but if you must use it, substitute 4 tablespoons of it for the butter, making sure it's very cold when you add it to the flour (add it along with the butter).

snippet: Transportation officials decided to suspend the explosive blasts around East 72nd Street each afternoon until Dec. 5 to better contain dust.
abstract: Metropolitan Transportation Authority officials decide to temporarily suspend explosive blasts around Second Avenue subway construction site on East 72nd Street in Manhattan in order to better contain dust; decision is met with mixed reactions from business owners, some of whom express relief and others impatience over the delay in getting the project finished.

headline.main: 2 Views on Subway Project: Delay Work to Clear Air, or Carry On and Profit Sooner
headline.print_headline: 2 Views on Subway Project: Delay Work to Clear Air, or Carry On and Profit Sooner

snippet: Several apps — some free, some costing up to $90 — offer analysis and tips for those who want to make informed bets on N.F.L. games.
abstract: Bob Tedeschi App Smart column highlights apps that offer analysis and tips for those who want to make informed bets on professional football games.

headline.main: Some Tools for the Underdog in the Football Pool
